title: Mumford & Sons: The Road to Red Rocks (Video 2013)
overview: English folk rock band captured live in performance at the Red Rocks Ampitheatre in Colorado in summer 2012. As well as footage of the concert itself the journey of the band to Red Rocks is explored, from their humble origins in the West London music scene to their ability to sell out the spectacular 10,000 capacity open-air amphitheatre.
storyline: The tour of music band Mumford and Sons as they approach their final show at Red Rocks, told through the band's performances.
